html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-09972022-09-22,  ,  ,  ,  PMO
ActOther Than Statutory Authority
SubjectOrder Changing the English version of the Title of the Special Adviser to the Minister of Justice (Federal Ombudsperson for Victims of Crime)
PrecisOrder (1) changing the English version of the name of the special adviser to the Minister of Justice, from "Federal Ombudsman for Victims of Crime" to "FEDERAL OMBUDSPERSON FOR VICTIMS OF CRIME"; and (2) amending the schedule to the English version of Order in Council P.C. 2014-615 of May 27, 2014 by replacing “Ombudsman” with “Ombudsperson” in Sections 2 to 9.
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Order Changing the English version of the Title of the Special Adviser to the Minister of Justice (Federal Ombudsperson for Victims of Crime)
precis: Order (1) changing the English version of the name of the special adviser to the Minister of Justice, from "Federal Ombudsman for Victims of Crime" to "FEDERAL OMBUDSPERSON FOR VICTIMS OF CRIME"; and (2) amending the schedule to the English version of Order in Council P.C. 2014-615 of May 27, 2014 by replacing “Ombudsman” with “Ombudsperson” in Sections 2 to 9.
